Package index

Discover Tables

nso_itms()
List available NSO tables
nso_itms_detail()
Get variable codes for a table
nso_itms_search()
Search tables by keyword
nso_itms_by_sector()
List tables under a sector or sub-sector
nso_sectors()
List top-level sectors
nso_subsectors()
List sub-sectors for a sector

Fetch Data

nso_data()
Fetch statistical data for a table
nso_package()
Fetch multiple tables in one request
nso_search()
Search NSO tables

Boundaries and Joins

mn_boundaries()
Mongolia administrative boundaries (sf)
mn_boundary_keys()
Boundary keys/crosswalk helper
mn_boundaries_normalize()
Add normalized name columns to boundaries
mn_join_by_name()
Join data to boundaries by (normalized) names
mn_fuzzy_join_by_name()
Fuzzy join data to boundaries by name

Utilities

nso_cache_enable()
Enable or configure caching
nso_cache_disable()
Disable caching
nso_cache_clear()
Clear cached entries
nso_period_seq()
Create period codes
nso_table_periods()
Get valid periods for a table
